name: Historical Non-violent Resistances
content:
Description: data about various non-violent movements and resistances throughout world history.

[Source](http://en.wikipedia.org/)

Columns:

* Dates (string): date or range of dates / years a movement or event took place
* Region (string): region of the world where the movement or resistance took place
* Movement / Main Purpose or Response (string): cause or belief behind the movement (etc.), such as Women's Suffrage or Draft resistance
* Summary (string): more detailed summation of the non-violent resistance
